name: FPS Elite Force City: Counter
description:
FPS Elite Force City: Counter Terrorism is a super amazing FPS game having highly addictive gameplay. This game will let you combat like a real sniper shooter in this modern FPS battle game. You as a secret army commando hero will go and counter terrorist force in an extreme shooting battle game. Go and counter terrorist force like a real battle shooter hero of army force.
Game Features
- Best shoot fire
- Realistic scenes
- Call of the modern war
- Simple and smooth control
- Shocking music and sound effects
- Top action level in the real battlefield environment
